params.val: If 0, dripping is disabled, else enabled

ChangeDrippingStatus(uint256).return: retursn is Dripping is allowed or not

params.tokenToDrip: Address of the token to be dripped

ChangeTokenBeingDripped(address).return: returns the address of the token that will be Dripped

changeDripSpeed(uint256).return: returns a Boolean True is Successful

params.target_: Address to which the amount is to be transferred

ChangeTokenBeingDripped(address).notice: Change the token being dripped to the Protocol's Core Contract

changeDripSpeed(uint256).notice: To change the Current Drip Speed

drip().notice: Drips the Tokens to the SIGHtroller

transferSighTo(address,uint256).notice: Transfers the SIGH Tokens to the Target Address
